bibl.title: Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short Texts Gathered from Many Publications (Short Texts II 278-1200). A. Texts; - B. Concordances, Appendices, Indexes and Plates. (Studia Demotica. 9 A; - B.)
bibl.note: Short Texts II, 278-1200 [Short Texts I: Idem, Some Coins of Artaxerxes and Other Short Texts in the Demotic Script Found on Various Objects Gathered from Many Publications = Studia Demotica. 5 (Leuven - Paris, Walpole, MA, 2001)]. - Pp. xxv-xxxvi: Corrections and Additions to Short Texts Volume I [incl. Nos 278-289]. - I. Mummy Labels from Thebes (290-308). - II. Mummy Labels from Dendara (309-423, C.J. Martin). - III. Mummy Labels of Various Origins (424-457). - IV. Mummy Labels from the Panopolite Region (458-898). - V. Mummy Labels of Unknown Origin (899-939). - VI. Mummy Linen (940-1044). - VII. Mummy Cases, Coffins, Chests and Masks (1045-1106). - VIII. Mummified Fauna (1107-1136). - IX. Funerary Papyri and Ostraka (1137-1177). - X. Addenda (1178-1200).
bibl.seg: Vleeming S.P., Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short Texts Gathered from Many Publications (Short Texts II 278-1200). A. Texts; - B. Concordances, Appendices, Indexes and Plates. (Studia Demotica. 9 A; - B.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters, 2011, 8°, xxxvi-pp. 1-735; - vi-pp. 737-1127, 16 tabl., 18 arbres généal., nombr. figg. et 38 pll. ISBN 978-90-429-2589-2. €125.
